name: PacMan - A Ghost Story
description:
PacMan - A Ghost Story is a short alternative version of Pac Man with a small narrative plot:  "A ghost tries to fall asleep with a stomach full of "PacMan",  but it suddenly wakes up in a labyrinth where it's not the hunter but the prey. A  nightmare or the reality?"

--------------------------------------------

WASD = Move around.

Mouse = Look around.

Key 1 = Fire a super dot to see better in the dark ( cost 5 yellow dots).

Key 2 = Invulnerability (cost 25 yellow dots).

--------------------------------------------

The game is all done in Unreal Engine full C++ and the 3D models are self-created. The labyrinth and all its elements (player, ghosts, items, exit and teleports) are generated through the input of a string. 

Future Update

I would like to add an editor to allow players to create their custom mazes and experience.
